titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C33

availability.licence: Distributed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License

body.ab: <lb n="c57-0172__main__27"/> August <mdel>27</mdel>31th<lb n="c57-0172__main__28"/> My beloved <mdel>s</mdel>Sister<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0172__main__29"/> I write to you encompassed by peril <lb n="c57-0172__main__30"/> and ignorant if I am ever doomed to <lb n="c57-0172__main__31"/> see again <del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e31687__Start"/>my<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e31687__End"/> dear England & the dearer <lb n="c57-0172__main__32"/> friends that inhabit it. I am surrounded <lb n="c57-0172__main__33"/> by mountains of ice which admit of no <lb n="c57-0172__main__34"/> escape and threaten every moment to<lb n="c57-0173__main__1"/> crush my vessel. The brave fellows whom I persua<lb n="c57-0173__main__2"/>ded to be my companions look at me for aid <lb n="c57-0173__main__3"/> but I have none <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to bestow. There is somthing terribly appall<lb n="c57-0173__main__4"/>ing in our situation Yet my courage & hopes do <lb n="c57-0173__main__5"/> not desert me — We may survive & if we do not – <lb n="c57-0173__main__6"/> I will repeat the lessons of my Seneca & die with a <lb n="c57-0173__main__7"/> good heart.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0173__main__8"/> Yet what, Margaret, will be your state – You <lb n="c57-0173__main__9"/> will not hear of my destruction and you will <lb n="c57-0173__main__10"/> anxiously awai<mdel>d</mdel>t my return – Years will pass <lb n="c57-0173__main__11"/> and you will have visitings of despair &<lb n="c57-0173__main__12"/> yet be cheered by hope. Oh my beloved sister <lb n="c57-0173__main__13"/> the <del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e31759__Start"/>siskness<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e31759__End"/> sicknening failings of your heart <lb n="c57-0173__main__14"/> felt expectations <del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e31764__Start"/>have<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e31764__End"/> are in prospect <lb n="c57-0173__main__15"/> more terrible to me than my own death –But <lb n="c57-0173__main__16"/> you have a husband and lovely children— <lb n="c57-0173__main__17"/> you may be happy — Heaven bless you &<lb n="c57-0173__main__18"/> make you so.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0173__main__19"/> My <del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e31781__Start"/>in<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e31781__End"/> unfortunate gu<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e31784__Start"/>i<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e31784__End"/>est regards <lb n="c57-0173__main__20"/> me with the tenderest compassion – He <lb n="c57-0173__main__21"/><del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e31790__Start"/>fills<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e31790__End"/> endeavours to fill me with hope – And <lb n="c57-0173__main__22"/> talks as if life were a thing which he loved <lb n="c57-0173__main__23"/> He reminds me how often the same acci<lb n="c57-0173__main__24"/>dents have happened to other navigators, <lb n="c57-0173__main__25"/> who have attempted the same sea. In <lb n="c57-0173__main__26"/> spite of myself he fills me with cheerful <lb n="c57-0173__main__27"/> augu<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e31811__Start"/>i<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e31811__End"/>ries. Even the sailors feel the benefit <lb n="c57-0173__main__28"/> of his eloquence – when he speaks they <lb n="c57-0173__main__29"/> no longer despair – he rouzes their ener<lb n="c57-0173__main__30"/>gies& they believe <del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e31825__Start"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>when<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e31825__End"/> these vast mountains <lb n="c57-0173__main__31"/> of ice <del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e31840__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e31840__End"/>are mole hills which will va<lb n="c57-0173__main__32"/>nish before the resolutions of man. <lb n="c57-0173__main__33"/><del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e31858__Start"/>But<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e31858__End"/> this is but transitory and each <lb n="c57-0173__main__34"/> days expectation delayed, fills them fear &<lb n="c57-0173__main__35"/> I almost dread the mutiny of despair<lb n="c57-0174__main__1"/> September 6th<lb n="c57-0174__main__2"/> A scene has just passed of such <del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e31889__Start"/>curious<del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e31889__End"/>uncommoninter<lb n="c57-0174__main__3"/>rest that although it is highly probable that <lb n="c57-0174__main__4"/> the papers may never reach you, my dear <lb n="c57-0174__main__5"/> Margeret, yet I cannot forbear recording it. <lb n="c57-0174__main__6"/> We are still surrounded by <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>mountains of ice still in <mdel>e</mdel>im <lb n="c57-0174__main__7"/>minent danger of being crushed in their conflict.— The cold is excessive &<lb n="c57-0174__main__8"/><lb n="c57-0174__left_margin__1"/>many of my unfortunate comrades have already <lb n="c57-0174__main__9"/> found a grave admidst this scene of <lb n="c57-0174__main__10"/> desolation. Frankenstein has declined daily <lb n="c57-0174__main__11"/><del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e31951__Start"/>his<del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e31951__End"/> in health a feverish fire still glim<lb n="c57-0174__main__12"/>mers in his eyes but he is ex<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>hausted &<lb n="c57-0174__main__13"/> when suddenly rouzed to any exertion he <lb n="c57-0174__main__14"/> speedily sinks again <mdel>to</mdel>into apparent lifelessness.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0174__main__15"/> I mentioned my last letter the fears <lb n="c57-0174__main__16"/> I had of mutiny. This morning as I sat <lb n="c57-0174__main__17"/> watching the wan countenance of my friend his <lb n="c57-0174__main__18"/> eyes half closed and his limbs hanging list<lb n="c57-0174__main__19"/>lessly I was rouzed by half a dozen of the <lb n="c57-0174__main__20"/> sailors who desired admission into the ca<lb n="c57-0174__main__21"/>bin they enter<del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e32014__Start"/>r<del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e32014__End"/>ed & their leader adressed <lb n="c57-0174__main__22"/> me. He told me that he & his compani<lb n="c57-0174__main__23"/>ons had been chosen by the other sailors <lb n="c57-0174__main__24"/> to come in deputation to me to make <lb n="c57-0174__main__25"/> a demand which in justice I could not <lb n="c57-0174__main__26"/> refuse. We were immured by ice &<lb n="c57-0174__main__27"/> would probably never escape but they <lb n="c57-0174__main__28"/> feared that if, as was possible the ice <lb n="c57-0174__main__29"/> should be dissipated and a free passage <lb n="c57-0174__main__30"/> opened I should be rash enough to conti<lb n="c57-0174__main__31"/>nue my voyage & lead them to fresh <lb n="c57-0174__main__32"/> dangers after they <del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e32055__Start"/>had<del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e32055__End"/>might<mdel>so</mdel> happily havesur<lb n="c57-0174__main__33"/>mounted<del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e32076__Start"/>this<del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e32076__End"/><mdel>.</mdel>this. They desired therefore that <lb n="c57-0174__main__34"/> I should make a solemn promise that <lb n="c57-0174__main__35"/> when if the vessel should be freed, <metamark>^</metamark>that I<lb n="c57-0175__main__1"/> would instantly direct my course to En<lb n="c57-0175__main__2"/>gland.Archangel.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0175__main__3"/> This speech tro<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ubled <del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32139__Start"/>b<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32139__End"/> me. I <del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32145__Start"/>did<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32145__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>had not despaired<lb n="c57-0175__main__4"/> nor had I yet conceived the idea of returning <lb n="c57-0175__main__5"/> if set free. Yet could I <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>in justice, or even in <lb n="c57-0175__main__6"/> possibility refuse th<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32176__Start"/>e<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32176__End"/>is<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32185__Start"/>e<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32185__End"/><del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32190__Start"/>men<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32190__End"/>demand. I hesitated be<lb n="c57-0175__main__7"/>fore I answered when Frankenstein who had <lb n="c57-0175__main__8"/><del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32208__Start"/>hitherto<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32208__End"/> at first been silent & indeed <lb n="c57-0175__main__9"/><lb n="c57-0175__left_margin__1"/>appeared hardly to have force enough to attend <lb n="c57-0175__main__10"/> now rouzed himself. His eyes sparkled <lb n="c57-0175__main__11"/> an<mdel>y</mdel>d his cheek flushed was with momentary <lb n="c57-0175__main__12"/> vigour. <del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32242__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32242__End"/> Turning to the men he <lb n="c57-0175__main__13"/> said; What do you mean? What do <lb n="c57-0175__main__14"/> you demand of your captain? Are <lb n="c57-0175__main__15"/> you then so easily turned from your <lb n="c57-0175__main__16"/> design? Did you <del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32254__Start"/>n<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32254__End"/>ot <del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32257__Start"/>expect<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32257__End"/> call this <lb n="c57-0175__main__17"/> a glorious expedition &<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32265__Start"/>why<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32265__End"/>wherefore was it <mdel>so</mdel>glorious?<lb n="c57-0175__main__18"/> Not because the way was smooth <lb n="c57-0175__main__19"/>& placid as a <del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32287__Start"/>summer lake<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32287__End"/>southern sea but <lb n="c57-0175__main__20"/> because it was full of dangers &<lb n="c57-0175__main__21"/> terror – because at every new incident <lb n="c57-0175__main__22"/> your fortitude was to be called forth & your <lb n="c57-0175__main__23"/> courage exhibited– Because death & danger <lb n="c57-0175__main__24"/> surrounded you & these you were to <lb n="c57-0175__main__25"/> brave & overcome. For this was it a glori<lb n="c57-0175__main__26"/>ous; for this was it <mdel>&</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>an honorable under<lb n="c57-0175__main__27"/>taking. You were to <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>be hereafter hailed <lb n="c57-0175__main__28"/> as the benefactors of your species – Your names <lb n="c57-0175__main__29"/> adored as the brave men who encoun<lb n="c57-0175__main__30"/>tered death for honor &<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32363__Start"/>glory<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32363__End"/>the benefit of mankind. – And now <lb n="c57-0175__main__31"/> behold with the first <del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32374__Start"/>straw<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32374__End"/>imagination of danger –or if <lb n="c57-0175__main__32"/> you will – The first mighty & terrific <lb n="c57-0175__main__33"/> trial <del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32386__Start"/>you shri<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e32386__End"/> of your courage you <lb n="c57-0175__main__34"/> shrink away & are content to be handed<lb n="c57-0176__main__1"/> down as men who had not strength <del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32400__Start"/>danger<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32400__End"/>to endure<lb n="c57-0176__main__2"/> cold & peril – And so poor souls they were <lb n="c57-0176__main__3"/> chilly & returned to their warm fire sides–Why <lb n="c57-0176__main__4"/> that requires not this preperation –Ye need <lb n="c57-0176__main__5"/> not <del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32419__Start"/>co<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32419__End"/> have come thus far & dragged <del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32422__Start"/>to<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32422__End"/> your <lb n="c57-0176__main__6"/> Captain to the shame of a defeat to prove <lb n="c57-0176__main__7"/> yourselves cowards. Oh be men or be <del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32430__Start"/>for<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32430__End"/><lb n="c57-0176__main__8"/> more than men – be steady to your pur<lb n="c57-0176__main__9"/>poses& firm as rock. this ice is not made <lb n="c57-0176__main__10"/> of such stuff as your hearts might be. it is mutable & cannot <lb n="c57-0176__main__11"/> withand you if you say that it shall <lb n="c57-0176__main__12"/> not. Do not return to your families <lb n="c57-0176__main__13"/> with <del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32460__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32460__End"/> the stigma of disgrace marked on <lb n="c57-0176__main__14"/> your brows– return as heroes who have <lb n="c57-0176__main__15"/> fought & conquered & who know not what <lb n="c57-0176__main__16"/> it is to turn their backs on the foe<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32469__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32469__End"/>.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0176__main__17"/> He spoke thus with a voice so mo<lb n="c57-0176__main__18"/>dulated to the different feelings expressed <lb n="c57-0176__main__19"/> in his speech – with an eye so full of <lb n="c57-0176__main__20"/> high design & heroism that can you <lb n="c57-0176__main__21"/> wonder that the<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32490__Start"/>n<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32490__End"/> men were moved –They <lb n="c57-0176__main__22"/> looked at one <del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32497__Start"/>atho<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32497__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>another& were unable to reply. <lb n="c57-0176__main__23"/> I spoke. I told them to retire & consider <lb n="c57-0176__main__24"/> of what had been said. That I would <lb n="c57-0176__main__25"/> not lead them further north if they <lb n="c57-0176__main__26"/> streneously <mdel/>desired the contrary but that <lb n="c57-0176__main__27"/> I hoped that with reflection their courage <lb n="c57-0176__main__28"/> would return. They retired and I turned to <lb n="c57-0176__main__29"/> my friend but he was sunk<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32533__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32533__End"/> in languor <lb n="c57-0176__main__30"/> and almost deprived of life.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0176__main__31"/> How <del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32542__Start"/>it<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32542__End"/><del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32545__Start"/>will<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32545__End"/> all this <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>will terminate I <lb n="c57-0176__main__32"/> know not. But I had rather die <mdel>&</mdel>than return <lb n="c57-0176__main__33"/> shamefully, my purpose unfulfilled–Yet <lb n="c57-0176__main__34"/> I fear <del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32576__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32576__End"/><del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32579__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32579__End"/>such will be my fate The <lb n="c57-0176__main__35"/> men <del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32589__Start"/>unf<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e32589__End"/> unsupported by the ideas of glory<lb n="c57-0177__main__1"/> and honor can<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32599__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32599__End"/> never willingly continue to en<lb n="c57-0177__main__2"/>dure their present hardships.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0177__main__3"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0177.01" unit="tei:date"/>September 7th<lb n="c57-0177__main__4"/> The die is cast. I have consented to return if we <lb n="c57-0177__main__5"/> are not destroyed. Thus are my hopes blasted– <lb n="c57-0177__main__6"/> by cowardice and indecision – I come back <lb n="c57-0177__main__7"/><del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32629__Start"/>bringing no new<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32629__End"/>ignorant& dissa<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ppointed –It requires a <lb n="c57-0177__main__8"/> great deal ofmore philosophy <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>than I possess to bear this injustice <lb n="c57-0177__main__9"/> with patience –<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0177__main__10"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0177.04" unit="tei:date"/>September 1<mdel>7</mdel>2th<lb n="c57-0177__main__11"/> It is past. I am returning to <del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32694__Start"/>England<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32694__End"/>Archangel. I have <lb n="c57-0177__main__12"/> lost my hopes of utility & glory –I have lost <lb n="c57-0177__main__13"/> my friend. But <del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32706__Start"/>if<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32706__End"/> I <mdel>am</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>will<mdel>at</mdel> endeavour <lb n="c57-0177__main__14"/> to detail the bitter circumstances to you, <lb n="c57-0177__main__15"/> my dear sister – And while I am wafted <lb n="c57-0177__main__16"/> towards England & towards you I will not <lb n="c57-0177__main__17"/> despair. <del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32734__Start"/>Sep<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32734__End"/><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0177__main__18"/> September 9th The ice began to move <lb n="c57-0177__main__19"/> and roarings like thunder was heard <lb n="c57-0177__main__20"/> at a distance as the <del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32751__Start"/>mountains<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32751__End"/>islands split <lb n="c57-0177__main__21"/>& cracked in every direction. We were <lb n="c57-0177__main__22"/> in the most eminent peril – But as we <lb n="c57-0177__main__23"/> could only remain passive my chief at<lb n="c57-0177__main__24"/>tention was <del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32771__Start"/>co<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32771__End"/> occupied by my unfor<lb n="c57-0177__main__25"/>tunate guest whose illness encreased to <lb n="c57-0177__main__26"/> such a degree that <del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32783__Start"/>to<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32783__End"/> he was entirely <lb n="c57-0177__main__27"/> confined to his bed. The ice cracked be<lb n="c57-0177__main__28"/>hind us and was driven with force <lb n="c57-0177__main__29"/> towards the north – a bree<mdel>h</mdel>ze sprung <lb n="c57-0177__main__30"/> from that quarter –<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>andon the 11th the passage to <lb n="c57-0177__main__31"/> wards the south <del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32827__Start"/>was<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32827__End"/>became free <del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32835__Start"/>on th<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e32835__End"/><lb n="c57-0177__main__32"/> When the sailors saw this & that their <lb n="c57-0177__main__33"/> return towards their native country <lb n="c57-0177__main__34"/> was apparently assured a shout of <lb n="c57-0177__main__35"/> tumutuous joy broke from them<lb n="c57-0178__main__1"/> loud & long continued.– Frankenstein who was dozing <lb n="c57-0178__main__2"/> awoke<mdel>k</mdel>de & asked the reason of the tumult– I was unable to <lb n="c57-0178__main__3"/> reply. He asked again – They shout I said be<lb n="c57-0178__main__4"/>cause they will soon return to England.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0178__main__5"/> Do you then really return.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0178__main__6"/> Alas yes. I cannot with<del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e32886__Start"/>a<del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e32886__End"/>stand their <lb n="c57-0178__main__7"/> demands – I cannot lead them <del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e32891__Start"/>to danger<del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e32891__End"/><lb n="c57-0178__main__8"/> unwi<mdel>tt</mdel>llingly to dangerer& I must return.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0178__main__9"/> Do so if you will, <del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e32913__Start"/>said my friend,<del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e32913__End"/> but <lb n="c57-0178__main__10"/> I will not. You may give up your pur<lb n="c57-0178__main__11"/>pose but mine is assigned to b<mdel>e</mdel>y heaven <lb n="c57-0178__main__12"/> and I dare not. I am weak, continued he <lb n="c57-0178__main__13"/> sinking down<del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e32941__Start"/>g<del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e32941__End"/> again but surely the minis<lb n="c57-0178__main__14"/>ters<lb n="c57-0178__left_margin__1"/>spirits who assist my vengeance will endow <lb n="c57-0178__main__15"/> me with sufficient strength – Saying <lb n="c57-0178__main__16"/> this endeavoured to spring from the bed <lb n="c57-0178__main__17"/> but the exertion was too great <del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e32972__Start"/>fror<del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e32972__End"/>for him <lb n="c57-0178__main__18"/> he fell back & fainted. It was long before he <lb n="c57-0178__main__19"/> was restored I often thought that life <lb n="c57-0178__main__20"/> was entirely extinct – <del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e32988__Start"/>but<del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e32988__End"/><mdel>a</mdel>At length he <lb n="c57-0178__main__21"/> opened his eyes – but he breathed with <lb n="c57-0178__main__22"/> difficulty and was unable to speak – The <lb n="c57-0178__main__23"/><del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e33008__Start"/>ph<mdel>y</mdel>isycian<del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e33008__End"/>surgeon,<del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e33026__Start"/>ordered us to give<del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e33026__End"/>gave him a composing <lb n="c57-0178__main__24"/> draught and ordered us to leave him <lb n="c57-0178__main__25"/><del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e33037__Start"/>qu<del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e33037__End"/> undisturbed. I<mdel>t</mdel>n the mean time he <lb n="c57-0178__main__26"/> told me that my friend had certainly <lb n="c57-0178__main__27"/> not many hours to live.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0178__main__28"/> His sentence was pronounced & I <lb n="c57-0178__main__29"/> could only grieve & be <del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e33061__Start"/>pass<del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e33061__End"/> patient. I <lb n="c57-0178__main__30"/> sat by <del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e33066__Start"/>he<del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e33066__End"/> his bed watching him –his eyes <lb n="c57-0178__main__31"/> were closed and I thought he slept. But <lb n="c57-0178__main__32"/> presently he called to me in a feeble voice <lb n="c57-0178__main__33"/> and bidding me come near said– Alas! the <lb n="c57-0178__main__34"/> strength I relied on is gone – I feel that I<lb n="c57-0179__main__1"/> shall soon die and he my enemy &perse<lb n="c57-0179__main__2"/>cutor may still be in being. Think not, Walton, <lb n="c57-0179__main__3"/> than in the last moments of my existence <lb n="c57-0179__main__4"/> I feel that burning hatred & ardent desire <lb n="c57-0179__main__5"/> of revenge that I once expressed but I feel <lb n="c57-0179__main__6"/> myself justified in desiring the monsters <lb n="c57-0179__main__7"/> death. During these last days I have <lb n="c57-0179__main__8"/> been occupied in <del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33104__Start"/>ex <del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33106__Start"/>h<del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33106__End"/>a<del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33104__End"/> examining my <lb n="c57-0179__main__9"/> past conduct <mdel>an</mdel>nor do I find it blamable. <lb n="c57-0179__main__10"/><del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33123__Start"/>In<del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33123__End"/> In a fit of enthusiastic madness I crea<lb n="c57-0179__main__11"/>ted a rational creature & was bound <lb n="c57-0179__main__12"/><del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33134__Start"/>by<del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33134__End"/> towards him to assure as far as in me <lb n="c57-0179__main__13"/> lay his happiness & well being– this was <lb n="c57-0179__main__14"/> my duty– but there was one still para<lb n="c57-0179__main__15"/>mount to this. <del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33148__Start"/>It<del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33148__End"/><del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33151__Start"/>was<del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33151__End"/> My duties towards <lb n="c57-0179__main__16"/> my fellow creatures had greater claims <lb n="c57-0179__main__17"/> because they <mdel>e</mdel>included a greater portion <lb n="c57-0179__main__18"/> of happiness or misery–. Urged by this view I refused <lb n="c57-0179__main__19"/> and I did right in refusing to <del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33175__Start"/>cre<del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33175__End"/> create <lb n="c57-0179__main__20"/> a companion for the first creature– <lb n="c57-0179__main__21"/> He shewed unparelled malignity. He <lb n="c57-0179__main__22"/> destroyed my friend – <milestone spanTo="#c57-0179.03" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0179.02"/>beings who <del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33189__Start"/>had<del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33189__End"/><lb n="c57-0179__left_margin__1"/>possessed exquisite<lb n="c57-0179__main__23"/> sensations – happiness & wisdom<milestone spanTo="#c57-0179.05" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0179.04"/>he <lb n="c57-0179__main__24"/> devoted to destructionNor do I know <lb n="c57-0179__main__25"/>Where this thirst for <del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33219__Start"/>g<del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33219__End"/> vengeance <lb n="c57-0179__main__26"/> may end. Miserable himself, that <lb n="c57-0179__main__27"/> he may render <del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33228__Start"/>know<del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33228__End"/>no other wretched, <lb n="c57-0179__main__28"/><del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33236__Start"/>also<del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33236__End"/> he ought to die – Th<mdel>is</mdel>e task of <lb n="c57-0179__main__29"/> his destruction was mine but I have <lb n="c57-0179__main__30"/> failed. <del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33253__Start"/>In<del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33253__End"/> Once <del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33256__Start"/>I demanded<del loc="c57-0179__main__d1e33256__End"/> when actua<lb n="c57-0179__main__31"/>ted by selfish and vicious motives I <lb n="c57-0179__main__32"/> asked you to undertake my unfinished <lb n="c57-0179__main__33"/> work and I renew this request now when<lb n="c57-0180__main__1"/> I am only induced to make it by reason & virtue.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0180__main__2"/> Yet I cannot ask you to renounce your <lb n="c57-0180__main__3"/> country & friends to fulfil this task,–And <del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33287__Start"/>y<del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33287__End"/> now that <lb n="c57-0180__main__4"/> you<del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33292__Start"/>r<del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33292__End"/> are returning to England you have little <lb n="c57-0180__main__5"/> chance of me<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>eting with him.– But the consideration <lb n="c57-0180__main__6"/> of these points and the well balancing of <lb n="c57-0180__main__7"/> what you may esteem your duties I leave <lb n="c57-0180__main__8"/> to you — My judgement & ideas<mdel>is</mdel>are already disturbed <lb n="c57-0180__main__9"/> by <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the near approach of death – I dare not ask you <del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33342__Start"/>do<del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33342__End"/> to do what <lb n="c57-0180__main__10"/> I think right for I may still be misled <lb n="c57-0180__main__11"/> by passion.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0180__main__12"/> That he should live to <del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33354__Start"/>destroy<del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33354__End"/><del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33357__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33357__End"/> be <lb n="c57-0180__main__13"/> the means of misery disturbs me else <lb n="c57-0180__main__14"/> this hour when I <del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33364__Start"/>h<del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33364__End"/> momentarily expect <lb n="c57-0180__main__15"/><del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33371__Start"/>death<del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33371__End"/><lb n="c57-0180__left_margin__1"/>my release is the only happy one I have<del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33382__Start"/>n<del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33382__End"/><lb n="c57-0180__main__16"/> enjoyed for <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>several years. The forms of the beloved <lb n="c57-0180__main__17"/> dead flit before me and I hasten to <lb n="c57-0180__main__18"/> their arms. Farewell Walton. Seek hap<lb n="c57-0180__main__19"/>piness in tranquillity and avoid ambi<lb n="c57-0180__main__20"/>tion even if <del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33415__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33415__End"/> it be only the apparently <lb n="c57-0180__main__21"/> innocent one of shining in science &<lb n="c57-0180__main__22"/> discoveries. Yet <del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33422__Start"/>I<del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33422__End"/> why do I say this? I have <lb n="c57-0180__main__23"/> myself been blasted in these hopes but <lb n="c57-0180__main__24"/> another may succeed."–<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0180__main__25"/> His voice became fainter &<lb n="c57-0180__main__26"/> exhausted with <del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33438__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33438__End"/>his effort he <del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33447__Start"/>became<del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33447__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>sunk <del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33456__Start"/>ult<del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33456__End"/>into<lb n="c57-0180__main__27"/> silen<mdel>t</mdel>ce– About half an hour after<lb n="c57-0180__main__28"/>wards he endeavoured to speak, but <lb n="c57-0180__main__29"/> was unable – he pressed my hand feebly <lb n="c57-0180__main__30"/> and his eyes closed while a gentle smile <lb n="c57-0180__main__31"/> played on his lips.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0180__main__32"/> Marg<mdel>e</mdel>aret – What can I <del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33500__Start"/><del loc="c57-0180__main__d1e33500__End"/> say—Can I<lb n="c57-0181__main__1"/> make any comment on the death of <lb n="c57-0181__main__2"/> this glorious creature – Alas all that I can <del loc="c57-0181__main__d1e33515__Start"/>say<del loc="c57-0181__main__d1e33515__End"/> express <lb n="c57-0181__main__3"/> must be inadequate and feeble. My tears <lb n="c57-0181__main__4"/> flow<del loc="c57-0181__main__d1e33523__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0181__main__d1e33523__End"/> – But I journey towards England and I <lb n="c57-0181__main__5"/> may there find consolation.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0181__main__6"/> I am interrupted – What do these sounds <lb n="c57-0181__main__7"/> portend? It is midnight—the breeze blows <lb n="c57-0181__main__8"/> fairly and the watch on deck scarcely <lb n="c57-0181__main__9"/> stir–Again there is a sound and it comes <lb n="c57-0181__main__10"/> from the cabin where the <del loc="c57-0181__main__d1e33544__Start"/>p<del loc="c57-0181__main__d1e33544__End"/><lb n="c57-0181__main__11"/> remains of Frankenstien still lie<del loc="c57-0181__main__d1e33551__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0181__main__d1e33551__End"/> I <lb n="c57-0181__main__12"/> must <mdel>go</mdel>arise and examine. Good night <lb n="c57-0181__main__13"/> my sister. <lb n="c57-0181__main__14"/><metamark function="separate">_____</metamark><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0181__main__15"/> Great God! What a scene has just taken <lb n="c57-0181__main__16"/> place. I am yet dizzy with the remembrance <lb n="c57-0181__main__17"/> of it.– I hardly know whether I shall have the <lb n="c57-0181__main__18"/> power to <del loc="c57-0181__main__d1e33587__Start"/>record<del loc="c57-0181__main__d1e33587__End"/>detail it yet I will try for the tale <lb n="c57-0181__main__19"/> I have recorded is imcomplete without this <lb n="c57-0181__main__20"/> final and wonderful catastrophe.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0181__main__21"/> I entered the cabin where lay the <lb n="c57-0181__main__22"/> remains of my miserable guest. Over him <lb n="c57-0181__main__23"/> hung a form – which I cannot find words <lb n="c57-0181__main__24"/> to describe, gigantic in stature – yet un<lb n="c57-0181__main__25"/>couth& distorted – his face was hid as he <lb n="c57-0181__main__26"/> hung over the coffin by long lo<mdel>n</mdel>cks of ragged <lb n="c57-0181__main__27"/> hair – but his extended hand appeared <lb n="c57-0181__main__28"/> like those of the mummies for to nothing <lb n="c57-0181__main__29"/> else can I compare its colour & apparent <lb n="c57-0181__main__30"/> texture. When he heard a noise & saw me <lb n="c57-0181__main__31"/> enter he ceased his exclamations of grief <lb n="c57-0181__main__32"/> and sprung towards the window. Never was <lb n="c57-0181__main__33"/> any thing so hideous as <mdel/>his face so disgus<lb n="c57-0181__main__34"/>ting yet apalling – I shut my eyes involun<lb n="c57-0181__main__35"/>tarily while I called on him to stay. He pau<lb n="c57-0181__main__36"/>sed. Looking at me with wonder & then<lb n="c57-0182__main__1"/> again turning towards the lifeless form of his <lb n="c57-0182__main__2"/> creator he seemed to forget my presence while <lb n="c57-0182__main__3"/> every feature & gesture seemed instigated <lb n="c57-0182__main__4"/> by the wildest rage. That is also my victim, <lb n="c57-0182__main__5"/> he exclaimed—In his murder my crimes are <lb n="c57-0182__main__6"/><lb n="c57-0182__left_margin__1"/><del loc="c57-0182__left_margin__d1e33691__Start"/>ren <del loc="c57-0182__left_margin__d1e33691__End"/>consum<mdel>m</mdel>mate<del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33706__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33706__End"/>– Oh Frankenstein – Generous&<lb n="c57-0182__main__7"/> self devoted creature dare I ask <del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33713__Start"/>you<del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33713__End"/>thee to <lb n="c57-0182__main__8"/> pardon me – I who destroyed thee by des<lb n="c57-0182__main__9"/>troying those <del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33731__Start"/>thou<del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33731__End"/><del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33734__Start"/>you<del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33734__End"/>thou lovedst. Alas he is <lb n="c57-0182__main__10"/> dead and may not answer me.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0182__main__11"/> His voice seemed suffocated & my <lb n="c57-0182__main__12"/> first impulse which had been <del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33753__Start"/>at first<del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33753__End"/><lb n="c57-0182__main__13"/> to obey the dying request of my friend in <lb n="c57-0182__main__14"/> destroying his enemy <del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33761__Start"/>do<del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33761__End"/> now <del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33766__Start"/>died<del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33766__End"/><del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33769__Start"/>away<del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33769__End"/>was overwhelmed in <lb n="c57-0182__main__15"/> a mixture of curiosity & pity. I approach<lb n="c57-0182__main__16"/>ed him – yet I dared not look on him <lb n="c57-0182__main__17"/> there was somthing so <milestone spanTo="#c57-0182.04" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57.0182.02"/>unearthly<metamark function="transpose" target="#c57-0182.02">2</metamark>&<milestone spanTo="#c57-0182.05" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57.0182.03"/>scaring<metamark function="insert">^</metamark><metamark function="transpose" target="#c57-0182.03"><mdel>2</mdel>1</metamark><lb n="c57-0182__main__18"/> in his ugliness. I attempted to speak but <lb n="c57-0182__main__19"/> the words died away on my lips – The Monster <lb n="c57-0182__main__20"/> continued to utter wild & incoherent <lb n="c57-0182__main__21"/> self reproaches at length I said. Your <lb n="c57-0182__main__22"/> repentance is now useless. If you had felt <lb n="c57-0182__main__23"/> the stings of remorse before you urged <lb n="c57-0182__main__24"/><del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33826__Start"/>to extremity<del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33826__End"/> your diabolical vengeance <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to <del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33839__Start"/>its<del loc="c57-0182__main__d1e33839__End"/>this extremityFran<lb n="c57-0182__main__25"/>kenstein would yet have lived<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0182__main__26"/> And do you think, said the dæmon <lb n="c57-0182__main__27"/> that I was then dead to anguish and <lb n="c57-0182__main__28"/> remorse?— He – he continued pointing to <lb n="c57-0182__main__29"/> the corpse, he suffered not more <lb n="c57-0182__main__30"/> in the completion of the deed that <lb n="c57-0182__main__31"/> I did in its execution. A frightful <lb n="c57-0182__main__32"/> selfishness hurried me on while my <lb n="c57-0182__main__33"/> heart was torn with agony. Think ye<lb n="c57-0183__main__1"/> not that the groans of Clerval were music <lb n="c57-0183__main__2"/> to my <del loc="c57-0183__main__d1e33889__Start"/>ye<del loc="c57-0183__main__d1e33889__End"/> ear. My heart was made for love &<lb n="c57-0183__main__3"/> sympathy and when wrenched <del loc="c57-0183__main__d1e33894__Start"/>to<del loc="c57-0183__main__d1e33894__End"/> by misery to <lb n="c57-0183__main__4"/> vice & hatred it did not not endure the vio<lb n="c57-0183__main__5"/>lence of the change without torture such as you<metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0183.01">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0183__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0183__left_margin__2"/> cannot <lb n="c57-0183__left_margin__3"/> even im<lb n="c57-0183__left_margin__4"/>agine – When <lb n="c57-0183__main__6"/> Clerval died I returned to Switzerland how<lb n="c57-0183__main__7"/> many ti heart broken & overcome –I pitied <lb n="c57-0183__main__8"/> Frankenstein and his bitter sufferings – my <lb n="c57-0183__main__9"/> pity amounted to horror – I abhorred my <lb n="c57-0183__main__10"/> self – But when I saw that <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>he again <del loc="c57-0183__main__d1e33959__Start"/>he<del loc="c57-0183__main__d1e33959__End"/> dared <lb n="c57-0183__main__11"/>to hope for happiness– That while he heaped <lb n="c57-0183__main__12"/> wretchedness & despair on me he sought <lb n="c57-0183__main__13"/> his own enjoyment in feelings & passions <lb n="c57-0183__main__14"/> from <del loc="c57-0183__main__d1e33973__Start"/>whic<del loc="c57-0183__main__d1e33973__End"/> the indulgence of which I was <lb n="c57-0183__main__15"/> for ever barred – I was again rouzed to <lb n="c57-0183__main__16"/> indignation & revenge. I remembered my <lb n="c57-0183__main__17"/> threat & resolved to execute it—Yet when <lb n="c57-0183__main__18"/> she died— Nay then I <del loc="c57-0183__main__d1e33985__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0183__main__d1e33985__End"/> was not misera<lb n="c57-0183__main__19"/>ble –I cast off all feeling & all anguish <lb n="c57-0183__main__20"/> I rioted in the extent of my despair <lb n="c57-0183__main__21"/>& being urged thus far – I resolved to <lb n="c57-0183__main__22"/> finish my demoniacal design. And <lb n="c57-0183__main__23"/> it is now <del loc="c57-0183__main__d1e34005__Start"/>finished<del loc="c57-0183__main__d1e34005__End"/>ended – There is my last vic<lb n="c57-0183__main__24"/>tim.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0183__main__25"/> I was touched by the expressions of his <lb n="c57-0183__main__26"/> misery <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>yet I remembered what Frankenstein <lb n="c57-0183__main__27"/> had said of his eloquence &persua<lb n="c57-0183__main__28"/>sion – & when I again cast my eyes on <lb n="c57-0183__main__29"/><metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0183.03">^</metamark><lb n="c57-0183__left_margin__1"/>the form of my friend<del loc="c57-0183__main__d1e34054__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0183__main__d1e34054__End"/><del loc="c57-0183__main__d1e34058__Start"/>form<del loc="c57-0183__main__d1e34058__End"/> my indignation was <lb n="c57-0183__main__30"/> kindled – Wretch I said, It is well that <lb n="c57-0183__main__31"/> you come here to whine over the mise<lb n="c57-0183__main__32"/>ry you have created – you throw a torch <lb n="c57-0183__main__33"/> among a pile of buildings & when they<lb n="c57-0184__main__1"/> are consumed you si<mdel>d</mdel>t amid the ruins & lament <lb n="c57-0184__main__2"/> their fall. Hypocritical <del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34093__Start"/>fi<del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34093__End"/> Fiend! If he whom <lb n="c57-0184__main__3"/> you lament still lived still would you <lb n="c57-0184__main__4"/> persue him with your accursed vengeance. <lb n="c57-0184__main__5"/> It is not pity that you feel – it is sorrow that <lb n="c57-0184__main__6"/> your power of mischief is <del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34105__Start"/>at an end.<del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34105__End"/> anihilated<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0184__main__7"/><del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34112__Start"/>I par<del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34112__End"/> It is not thus, said the dæmon, &<lb n="c57-0184__main__8"/> yet <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>such must be your<del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34132__Start"/>must think so<del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34132__End"/>impression since such <lb n="c57-0184__main__9"/> appears to have been the purport of my <lb n="c57-0184__main__10"/> actions. But I do not seek <del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34146__Start"/>sympathy<del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34146__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>a fellow feeling in <lb n="c57-0184__main__11"/> my misery–I feel it deeply & truly & for sy<lb n="c57-0184__main__12"/>mpathy that I may never find. When <lb n="c57-0184__main__13"/> I first sought it– it was <mdel>in</mdel>the love of virtue, <lb n="c57-0184__main__14"/> it was <del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34179__Start"/>in<del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34179__End"/> feelings of happiness & content <lb n="c57-0184__main__15"/> that I wished to be participated. But <lb n="c57-0184__main__16"/> now that virtue is to me merely a sha<lb n="c57-0184__main__17"/>dow and happiness & content <del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34195__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34195__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>are turned <lb n="c57-0184__main__18"/> into despair shall I seek for sympathy <lb n="c57-0184__main__19"/> in that. No–I am content to suffer <lb n="c57-0184__main__20"/> alone while I do suffer – And when I <lb n="c57-0184__main__21"/> die I am satisfied that <del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34215__Start"/>death<del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34215__End"/> hatred <lb n="c57-0184__main__22"/>& opprobrium should load my memory. <lb n="c57-0184__main__23"/> Once my fancy was soothed by dreams <lb n="c57-0184__main__24"/> of virtue of fame &of enjoyment. Once <lb n="c57-0184__main__25"/> I hoped to meet with one who pardoning <lb n="c57-0184__main__26"/> my outward form <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>would love me for the <lb n="c57-0184__main__27"/> excellent qualities <del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34246__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34246__End"/>with which I <del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34256__Start"/>displayed<del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34256__End"/>was so eminently <lb n="c57-0184__left_margin__1"/> capable <lb n="c57-0184__left_margin__2"/> of bringing <lb n="c57-0184__left_margin__3"/> forth. – I <lb n="c57-0184__main__28"/> was then filled with high thoughts of <lb n="c57-0184__main__29"/> honour & self devotion – But now <del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34280__Start"/>crime<del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34280__End"/><lb n="c57-0184__left_margin__1"/>vice<lb n="c57-0184__main__30"/> has sunk me below the meanest <del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34297__Start"/>of<del loc="c57-0184__main__d1e34297__End"/><lb n="c57-0184__main__31"/> animal– no crimes can equal mine <lb n="c57-0184__main__32"/>& when I call over the frightful cata<lb n="c57-0184__main__33"/>logue I cannot believe that I am he <lb n="c57-0184__main__34"/>whose thoughts were once filled with<lb n="c57-0185__main__1"/> sublime & transcendant visions of loveliness. <lb n="c57-0185__main__2"/> But it is even so – The fallen Angel becomes a ma<lb n="c57-0185__main__3"/>lignant devil—Yet he even he Mans enemy had <lb n="c57-0185__main__4"/> friends & associate<mdel/>s, <del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34341__Start"/>while<del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34341__End"/> I am quite alone.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0185__main__5"/> You who call Frankenstein your friend &<lb n="c57-0185__main__6"/> seem to have a knowledge of my crimes &<lb n="c57-0185__main__7"/> his misfortunes – But in the detail that <lb n="c57-0185__main__8"/> he gave of them he could not sum up <lb n="c57-0185__main__9"/> the hours & months of misery that I endured <lb n="c57-0185__main__10"/> burning with impotent rage – For when <lb n="c57-0185__main__11"/> I destroyed his hopes I did not <del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34367__Start"/>relieve<del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34367__End"/>satisfy my own <lb n="c57-0185__main__12"/><del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34377__Start"/>wants<del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34377__End"/>desires. – They were as craving & ardent as <lb n="c57-0185__main__13"/><del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34385__Start"/>fef<del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34385__End"/> before <del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34388__Start"/>When Elizabeth died– her destru<del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34388__End"/><lb n="c57-0185__main__14"/> Still I desired love & fellowship and I was still <lb n="c57-0185__main__15"/> spurned – Was there no injustice in this? And <lb n="c57-0185__main__16"/> am I the only criminal while all man<lb n="c57-0185__main__17"/>kind sinned against me? Why do you not <lb n="c57-0185__main__18"/> hate Felix who drove his friend from his door <lb n="c57-0185__main__19"/> or the man who would have destroyed <lb n="c57-0185__main__20"/> the saviour of his child? Nay they are <lb n="c57-0185__main__21"/> virtuous & immalculate beings– While I the <lb n="c57-0185__main__22"/> miserable &<del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34415__Start"/>tra<mdel>p</mdel>mbled on<del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34415__End"/><del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34427__Start"/>trap<del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34427__End"/> trampeled <lb n="c57-0185__main__23"/> on, am <del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34435__Start"/>the devil<del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34435__End"/>an abortion to be spurned & kicked <lb n="c57-0185__main__24"/>& hated! Even now my blood boils at <lb n="c57-0185__main__25"/> the memory of this injustice –<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0185__main__26"/> But it is true <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>that I am a wretch. I have <lb n="c57-0185__main__27"/> murdered the lovely & the helpless. I have <lb n="c57-0185__main__28"/> seized the innocent as they slept and grasped <lb n="c57-0185__main__29"/> his throat to death who never injured me. <lb n="c57-0185__main__30"/> I devoted my creator to misery & have follow<lb n="c57-0185__main__31"/>edhim even to his <del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34482__Start"/>death<del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34482__End"/> destruction – You hate <lb n="c57-0185__main__32"/> me but your a<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>bhorrence cannot equal <lb n="c57-0185__main__33"/> mine for myself–I look on my hands that <lb n="c57-0185__main__34"/> executed the deed<del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34499__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0185__main__d1e34499__End"/> I think of the heart that <lb n="c57-0185__main__35"/> formed the plans & I loathe myself.<lb n="c57-0186__main__1"/> Fear not that I shall do more mischief my <lb n="c57-0186__main__2"/> work is nearly complete –It needs not yours or <lb n="c57-0186__main__3"/> any mans death to consumate it but it <lb n="c57-0186__main__4"/><mdel>me</mdel><del loc="c57-0186__main__d1e34521__Start"/>needs<del loc="c57-0186__main__d1e34521__End"/><lb n="c57-0186__left_margin__1"/>requires my own. And <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>do not think <del loc="c57-0186__main__d1e34543__Start"/>t<del loc="c57-0186__main__d1e34543__End"/><del loc="c57-0186__main__d1e34546__Start"/>not<del loc="c57-0186__main__d1e34546__End"/> that I <lb n="c57-0186__main__5"/> shall be slow to perform that sacrifice <lb n="c57-0186__main__6"/> I shall quit your vessel & on the ice raft <lb n="c57-0186__main__7"/> that brought me I shall seek <del loc="c57-0186__main__d1e34555__Start"/>to<del loc="c57-0186__main__d1e34555__End"/> the most <lb n="c57-0186__main__8"/>Northern extremity of land that the globe <lb n="c57-0186__main__9"/> affords – I shall collect my funeral pile <lb n="c57-0186__main__10"/> and consume myself to ashes – that my <lb n="c57-0186__main__11"/> remains may afford no light to any <lb n="c57-0186__main__12"/> curious & unhallowed wretch who would <lb n="c57-0186__main__13"/> create such another. I shall die. I shall <lb n="c57-0186__main__14"/> no longer feel the anguish that now <lb n="c57-0186__main__15"/> consumes me or be the prey of feelings <lb n="c57-0186__main__16"/> unsatisfied yet unquenched. He is dead <lb n="c57-0186__main__17"/> who created me and when I die the remem<lb n="c57-0186__main__18"/>brance of me will be lost for ever. <del loc="c57-0186__main__d1e34589__Start"/>Yet<del loc="c57-0186__main__d1e34589__End"/><lb n="c57-0186__main__19"/><del loc="c57-0186__main__d1e34593__Start"/>Strange<del loc="c57-0186__main__d1e34593__End"/> I shall no longer see the sun <lb n="c57-0186__main__20"/><del loc="c57-0186__main__d1e34599__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0186__main__d1e34599__End"/>or stars <mdel>of</mdel>or feel the winds play on my <lb n="c57-0186__main__21"/> cheeks– Light feeling & sense will die. <lb n="c57-0186__main__22"/> And in this must I find my happiness. <lb n="c57-0186__main__23"/> Some years ago when the images this <lb n="c57-0186__main__24"/> world affords first opened on me <lb n="c57-0186__main__25"/> when I felt the cheering warmth of sum <lb n="c57-0186__main__26"/> mer & heard the rustling of leaves &<lb n="c57-0186__main__27"/> the chirping of birds & these were all <lb n="c57-0186__main__28"/> to me I should have wept to die & now <lb n="c57-0186__main__29"/> it is my only consolation. Stained by crimes <lb n="c57-0186__main__30"/> and torn by the bitterest remorse where <lb n="c57-0186__main__31"/> can I find <del loc="c57-0186__main__d1e34645__Start"/>consolation<del loc="c57-0186__main__d1e34645__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>rest but in death.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0186__main__32"/> Farewell; I leave you and with <lb n="c57-0186__main__33"/> you the last of men that these eyes <lb n="c57-0186__main__34"/> will ever behold. Farewell, Frankenstein<lb n="c57-0187__main__1"/> If a desire for <del loc="c57-0187__main__d1e34671__Start"/>my<del loc="c57-0187__main__d1e34671__End"/><del loc="c57-0187__main__d1e34674__Start"/>unhapiness<del loc="c57-0187__main__d1e34674__End"/> revenge remain<mdel>e</mdel>s<mdel>d</mdel><lb n="c57-0187__main__2"/> to you in death it would be better satisfied in <lb n="c57-0187__main__3"/> my life than in my destruction – <del loc="c57-0187__main__d1e34694__Start"/>B<del loc="c57-0187__main__d1e34694__End"/> But it was <lb n="c57-0187__main__4"/> not so. You wished for my extinction that I <lb n="c57-0187__main__5"/> might not cause greater <del loc="c57-0187__main__d1e34703__Start"/>misery<del loc="c57-0187__main__d1e34703__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>wretchedness to others &<lb n="c57-0187__main__6"/> now you will not desire my life for my <lb n="c57-0187__main__7"/> own misery. <del loc="c57-0187__main__d1e34719__Start"/>In destroying you<del loc="c57-0187__main__d1e34719__End"/><del loc="c57-0187__main__d1e34724__Start"/>Miserabl<del loc="c57-0187__main__d1e34724__End"/><mdel>e</mdel>Blasted<lb n="c57-0187__main__8"/> as you were my <del loc="c57-0187__main__d1e34738__Start"/>wretchedness<del loc="c57-0187__main__d1e34738__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>agony is superior to <lb n="c57-0187__main__9"/> yours for remorse is the bitter sting that <lb n="c57-0187__main__10"/> rankles in my wounds & tortures me to <lb n="c57-0187__main__11"/> madness.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0187__main__12"/> But soon, he cried clasping his hands <lb n="c57-0187__main__13"/> I shall die and what I now feel will no <lb n="c57-0187__main__14"/> longer be felt – soon these thoughts –these <lb n="c57-0187__main__15"/> burning miseries will be extinct –I <lb n="c57-0187__main__16"/> shall ascend my pile triumphantly & the <lb n="c57-0187__main__17"/> flame that consumes my body will give <lb n="c57-0187__main__18"/><del loc="c57-0187__main__d1e34774__Start"/>rest & blessings<del loc="c57-0187__main__d1e34774__End"/>enjoyment or tranquillity to my mind.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0187__main__19"/> He sprung from the cabin window <lb n="c57-0187__main__20"/> as he said this <del loc="c57-0187__main__d1e34790__Start"/>on to<del loc="c57-0187__main__d1e34790__End"/>upon an ice raft that <lb n="c57-0187__main__21"/> lay close to the vessel <mdel>p</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><mdel>&</mdel>& pushing him<lb n="c57-0187__main__22"/>self off he was carried away by the <lb n="c57-0187__main__23"/> waves and I soon lost sight of him <lb n="c57-0187__main__24"/> in the darkness & distance.
